title: Amid affordability crisis, the White House has unveiled its plan to raise fuel costs
description:
The White House formally announced its plan to hike US fuel costs by $23 billion today, in the form of a new proposed rule cutting fuel efficiency requirements.



Update 12/3: This article has been updated to reflect the formal announcement of the proposed r…
